meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Mattingly Emily Moore Ryan Fenster Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7810.

td.p: Dave Mattingly, a director of technology from Old Forge, Pennsylvania
Emily Moore, a consultant from Atlanta, Georgia
Ryan Fenster, a banker from SeaTac, Washington (whose 7-day cash winnings total $156,497)

tr.td: HISTORY IN EUROPE
GET ME REWRITE!
HANDWEAR
MUSIC OF 20 YEARS AGO
DEAD IN SHAKESPEARE
AFTER NOON
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with "N-O" and come up in the dictionary after "noon".)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Isabel and Ferdinand

Emily
')

...
(Alex: As you discovered earlier this week, Ryan, you cannot change your response after we have ruled against you.)

the Appalachian Trail

RyanEmily
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
